author: ZEKE MILLER
title: CDC to significantly ease pandemic mask guidelines Friday
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The Biden administration will significantly loosen federal mask-wearing guidelines to protect against COVID-19 transmission on Friday, according to two people familiar with the matter, meaning most Americans will no longer be advised to wear…
